description: This Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) cancels and supersedes, for the requirements indicated, the previous RFSO number E60HL-230020/A (WS4006758308) dated May 12 2023, with a closing of July 19, 2023 at  2:00pm EST. National Master Standing Offers (NMSO) for Diesel Fuel, Automotive Gasoline, and Heating Fuel Oil in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards, as applicable.  Delivery to various locations in Canada on an as-and-when-requested basis from September 1, 2023 up to and including August 31, 2025.   The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Debriefings will be available upon request.
full_summary:
# E60HL-230020-B - Diesel Fuel, Automotive Gasoline, and Heating Fuel

## Notice Details

* Reference Number: WS4006758308-Doc4132763310
* Solicitation Number: WS4006758308
* Publication Date: August 4, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: August 23, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. EST
* Tender Status: Expired

## Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Trade Agreements: Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and other applicable trade agreements
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Various locations in Canada including Alberta, British Columbia, Yukon, Newfoundland and Labrador, Saskatchewan, National Capital Region (NCR), New Brunswick, Ontario (except NCR), Nova Scotia, Northwest Territories, Quebec (except NCR), Manitoba, and Prince Edward Island

## Solicitation Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking supplier bids for the delivery of diesel fuel, automotive gasoline, and heating fuel in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board (CGSB) standards. National Master Standing Offers (NMSO) are to be awarded to successful bidders. Delivery of goods is to be made on an as-and-when-requested basis from September 1, 2023 to August 31, 2025. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Tender Requirements

* Goods must meet CGSB standards
* Delivery to various locations in Canada
* On an as-and-when-requested basis from September 1, 2023 to August 31, 2025

## Evaluation Criteria

* Lowest Price ( lowest total bid price)

## Submission Instructions

Bidders must submit their bids electronically through the Ariba Discovery website. The bid deadline is August 23, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. EST. Debriefings will be available upon request.

## Contact Information

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Phone: Not available
* Email: Not available
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

## Attachments

None

## Languages

Documents may be submitted in either English or
